author_bio: Hello, I'm Dmytro, the passionate developer behind this app. My love for technology led me to create Love Notes. I'm dedicated to making your experience top-notch. Your feedback matters, so feel free to reach out. Enjoy the app!
author_contact_info: You can reach out to me at:
